title: Review: From Twyla Tharp, the Effort and Possibilities of Dancing
description: Two classics, “In the Upper Room” and “Nine Sinatra Songs,” share a program at City Center.
dc:creator: Siobhan Burke
media:credit: Erin Baiano for The New York Times
media:description: Fragile, triumphant: foreground, from left, Stephanie Petersen, Daisy Jacobson and Kaitlyn Gilliland in Twyla Tharp’s “In the Upper Room.”
